attributes.action: create a cemetery to the servicemen and women who have died in Iraq and Afghanistan.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Those who died in WW1 and WW2 are now buried in military cemeteries looked after by CWGC. 

I believe that this honour should also be given (if wished by the families of those killed) to the servicemen and women who have given their lives in our countries recent conflicts.

Not only will this show that we as a country still care for and are thankful to those who give their lives but it will also show our forces that their fight is worthwhile and not ust some war that will be forgotten 30 years down the line.

It could also be a place for families of those lost to visit and also many others could visit and realise the true cost of war.

Thankyou
